Action.author: corecode
Action.body: I would say that as application/chaincode developer, this should work without having to run a separate orderer process all together.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: I'd agree that there's also value in be able to bake this into a single process with the peer. But, I also think there's value in being able to have a network of peers without also requiring a network of orderers (which this speaks to). Fortunately, by the magic of gRPC if we build the latter, it should be trivial to link in as the former.
